landing.title: Thola iqembu elihambisana nawe
landing.subtitle: Phendula imibuzo ngezombusazwe zakho, ubone ukuthi yikuphi iqembu laseNingizimu Afrika elihambisana nemibono yakho.
landing.privacy: Izimpendulo zigcinwa kudivayisi yakho kuphela, azithunyelwa ndawo.

howItHelps.title: Ithuluzi likusize kanjani
howItHelps.intro: Qonda kahle lapho umi khona, wenze ivoti lakho libaluleke. Qhathanisa imibono yakho nezikhundla zamaqembu.

benefit1.title: Sika umsindo
benefit1.text: Dlula izithembiso; bona ukuthi amaqembu ahambisana kanjani nawe ezinqumweni zangempela.

benefit2.title: Thola okungalindelekile
benefit2.text: Thola amaqembu ongawazange uwacabange, ngokusekelwe ekuhambisaneni kwezinqumo, hhayi udumo.

benefit3.title: Bona zonke izimphumela
benefit3.text: Thola uhlu oluhlelwe ngamaphuzu kuwo wonke amaqembu—ubone ozimele phezulu namanye ongawacabanga.

benefit4.title: Vota ngokuzethemba
benefit4.text: Yenza isinqumo esaziwayo esisekelwe kudatha—imibono yakho iqhathaniswa nezikhundla zamaqembu.

about.title: Mayelana ne-Elekti
about.methodologyText: I-Elekti isebenzisa indlela esekelwe kuma-eksisi angu-12 ukuqhathanisa imibono yakho nezikhundla zamaqembu aseNingizimu Afrika. Uhlelo lwethu lufaneleke, lukhanyile, futhi aluthathi hlangothi.
about.howItWorksText: Uphendula imibuzo engama-50 ngezindawo ezahlukene—ezomnotho, ezokuphatha, ezokulingana njll. Umbuzo ngamunye uhlotshaniswa ne-eksisi ethile futhi unesilinganiso sawo. Izimpendulo zakho ziguqulwa zibe izikhundla kuma-eksisi bese ziqhathaniswa nezikhundla zamaqembu.
about.scoringText: I-algorithm yethu isebenza kanje: (1) Impendulo ngayinye iqhathaniswa nesikhundla seqembu kuleyo eksisi, sibala ukuhambisana (1 minus umehluko). (2) Ukuhambisana kuphindaphindwa ngesilinganiso sombuzo bese kuhlanganiswa nge-eksisi. (3) Amaphuzu e-eksisi anormaliswa ngephesenti lesisindo. (4) Iphuzu lokugcina liwukuhleleka okulinganiselwe kuma-eksisi onke. Amaphuzu aboniswa ngamaphesenti, futhi sinikeza izinga lokuzethemba ngokusekelwe kumaphuzu aphezulu nokuhlukana kuwo.
about.transparencyText: Izikhundla zamaqembu kanye izisindo zamibuzo zisekelwe ocwaningweni lwemibhalo esemthethweni yamaqembu. Indlela ivulekile futhi ingabuyekezwa. Asithathi hlangothi—sifuna ukukusiza wenze isinqumo esisekelwe kudatha.
about.dataSourcesText: Izikhundla ziqoqwa kumamanifeseto, izinqubomgomo, amarekhodi okhetho kanye nezitatimende eziqinisekisiwe. Siyabuyekezela idatha njalo. Uma kukhona okungalungile, wamukelekile ukusazisa ngebufakazi.
about.privacyText: Imfihlo yakho ibalulekile. Sibheka imibono yakho ngezombusazwe njengento yomuntu siqu okufanele ivikelwe.
about.noTrackingText: Asisebenzisi ama-cookie noma amathuluzi okulandelela. Asiboni izimpendulo zakho futhi azidluliselwa kumaseva ethu.
about.localOnlyText: Konke kwenzeka ku-browser yakho. Izimpendulo zigcinwa kudivayisi yakho kuphela. Uma usula idatha, imiphumela iyanyamalala.
about.sharingText: Uma wabelana imiphumela, izimpendulo zifakwa ngqo ku-URL. Akuthunyelwa kumaseva—ulawula ukuthi ubani oyibona.
about.analyticsText: Sisebenzisa i-Cloudflare Web Analytics—ayisebenzisi ama-cookie futhi ayilandeleli abantu. Iyasiza kuphela ngezibalo ezijwayelekile ngaphandle kokulimaza imfihlo yakho.
about.partiesText: Sifaka amaqembu angu-16 anombono ohlukene ku-spectrum yezombusazwe. Ukukhetha kusekelwe ekubalulekeni nasekuhlukaneni kwezimvo.
about.disclaimerText: I-Elekti iyithuluzi lokufundisa, hhayi esikhundleni socwaningo. Amaqembu ayinkimbinkimbi futhi izikhundla ziyashintsha. Funda amanifeseto, hamba emihlanganweni, futhi uqinisekise ulwazi ngokwakho. Le miphumela ikhombisa ukuhambisana ngezikhundla ezishiwo—ukuphatha sangempela kungahluka.
about.viewDataText: Ungahlola amafayela ethu e-JSON: izikhundla zamaqembu, izisindo, kanye nedatha yemibuzo esetshenziswa i-algorithm.

anc.desc: I-African National Congress (ANC) iyibandla elibusayo laseNingizimu Afrika. Ligcizelela i-demokratiya yesintu, inguquko enonjuunji, nokuciphisa ukunlingana ngomyalelo wohulumeni kanye nokusetshenziswa kwezinsiza zomphakathi.

da.desc: I-Democratic Alliance (DA) igcizelela i-demokratiya yelungile, umnotho okhululekile, kanye nezinqumo zobuswazi obungenzi umuntu ngemvelo yakhe. Igxile ekubuseni kahle nokwakheka kwemisebenzi.

mk.desc: uMkhonto weSizwe Party (MK) igcizelela inguquko enonjuunji yemnotho kanye zezinqumo zohulumeni, ukwakha kabusha izikhungo zikahulumeni, nokuciphisa ubuhlu bemvelo yesikhathi sangaphambi.

eff.desc: I-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) iyibandla elingakomele ekusezamlindini, igcizelela inguquko yomnotho engasetshenziswa amandla, ukunikazi kokwakha umnotho, nokuthathwa kombala ngaphandle kwekompani.

ifp.desc: I-Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) ikhomba abantu baseZulu, igcizelela inhlonipho yesiko lamaZulu, inkululeko ye-federo, umnotho okhululekile, kanye nokunakekela komphakathi. Nakubamhlophe, izinqumo zayo zigxile ku-siko lama-Zulu kanye ezidingeni zeKwaZulu-Natali.

pa.desc: I-Patriotic Alliance (PA) igcizelela ukuvikela umphakathi waseNingizimu Afrika, ukugxila ezidingweni zabantu basemalokishini, nokukhuthaza izinqumo ezigxila kumuzi wokuqala (South Africa first).

vfplus.name: Freedom Front Plus
vfplus.desc: I-Freedom Front Plus (VF+) ikhomba abantu ama-Afrikaans, igcizelela amalungelo esintu ama-Afrikaans, inkululeko ye-federo, amalungelo omuntu omncane, kanye nenkululeko yemiphakathi yokuzilawula. Izinqumo zayo zigxile ekugcineni kwesiko lama-Afrikaans kanye nokuzithwala kwayo.

actionsa.desc: I-ActionSA iyibandla elibeka phambili ukubusa kahle, ukulwa nenkohlakalo enonjuunji, nokwakha umnotho okhula ngokusebenzisa izinkampani zomuntu siqu.

acdp.desc: I-African Christian Democratic Party (ACDP) igcizelela izimiso zobuKristu ezinqubweni zohulumeni, inhlonipho yomndeni, ukugcinwa kwezimo ezendabuko, nokubusa kahle okulandelele umthetho womuntu.

ufc.desc: I-Unite for Change (UFC) igxile ekubuseni kahle, ekwakheni umnotho obanzi wesintu, nasekuhlanganiseni abantu abanemvelaphi ehlukene ngezinqumo eziyaphupha.

udm.desc: I-United Democratic Movement (UDM) iyibandla lama-demokratiya asenzile, igcizelela ukubusa kahle, ukulawula nenkohlakalo, nokwakha izikhungo zohulumeni ezizinzile kanye nokusebenza ngokolingano.

sacp.desc: I-South African Communist Party (SACP) igcizelela isistimu yesosialismu, amalungelo abasebenzi, nokuguqulwa komnotho kuye kubunikazi bokwakha umuntu. Igcizelela amalawuli eningi ohulumeni kwezindustriya ezikhulu.

atm.desc: I-African Transformation Movement (ATM) iyibandla lama-demokratiya abaseKristu, igcizelela izimiso zobuKristu, ukulunga komphakathi, ukubusa kahle okuhlonipha umthetho, kanye nokuphakamisela iminyango yezifundo.

aljama-ah.desc: I-Al Jama-ah iyibandla lama-demokratiya amu-Islamu, igcizelela izinqumo zabantu amu-Islamu, i-demokratiya yesintu, kanye nokuqinisa imiphakathi yamu-Islamu ngenkolo ethandeka umuntu wonke.

ncc.desc: I-National Coloured Congress (NCC) igxile ekumeleni nasekuvikelweni kwemiphakathi yabantu abamabalabala, kanye nokulingana kwamathuba nekuningana kumuntu.

pac.desc: I-Pan Africanist Congress of Azania (PAC) iyibandla elikhomba izintu zomnyama, igcizelela i-Pan-Africanism, uksosyalismu yafrika, ukwakha isizwe esimnyama esizimele, nokungeneza izinqumo ezikukhululeka komlando wokubandlulula.

q1.text: Uhulumeni kufanele wengeneza izinkokhelo kubantu abazwakalele ukuze afinanse izinqumo ezinkulu zezempilo, zesifundo, kanye zemiphakathi.

q2.text: Ukugcinwa kwezimali kanye nokunciphisa isikweletu sohulumeni kufanele kube umkhanyi, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba izikhundla zezempilo.

q3.text: Uhulumeni kufanele anikeze umuntu ngamunye isinqumo seveki eyisisekelo, hhayi ithamsanqa.

q4.text: Uhulumeni kufanele asebenzise izinqumo zekhonseshe yokusebenza ukuze anciphise isibalo sebantu abangenamisebenzi.

q5.text: Izinqumo zezempilo kufanele zibe ngentengo eyisuse kunabafundi onke, zesintu futhi hhayi zeswazi.

q6.text: Izifundo eziphakeme kufanele zibe ngentengo eyisuse kunabafundi onke, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba izinkokhelo ezikhulu.

q7.text: Uhulumeni kufanele anikeze amagcina amakhulu abazali ukuze basizwe nokuba semsebenzini habhanathi bezingane.

q8.text: Izinqumo zemthethweni yocwaningo kufanele ziqondise izikhundla zesintu, amaBhunu, kanye nabantu abaphilela, hhayi izikhundla enkulu.

q9.text: Uhulumeni kufanele asizele izinkampani ezincane nezikhundla zomuntu ozenzela isindu ngeokunciphisa imthetho kanye neamagcina.

q10.text: Izikhundla ezibalulekile (amandla, amanzi, isinye sexwayula) kufanele zibe zesintu futhi hhayi zekhompani zeswazi.

q11.text: Izikhundla zekhompani kufanele zivunyelwe ukungeneza nokuthengisa amandla okuze kuwe ibhala lamandla, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba i-Eskom.

q12.text: Izikhundla zamanzi kanye nokunikezela amanzi kufanele zibe zesintu futhi azivunyelwe zekhompani zeswazi.

q13.text: Umhlaba ungathathwa ngaphandle kwekompani uma kulubunje eguqulwa kwembila kwelinumbi.

q14.text: Izikhundla zekulima elinokuncane kanye nomuntu wesintu kufanele zenikezelwe amagcina amakhulu kunakukhompani elikhulu.

q15.text: Izinqumo zekulima zesintu kanye nokuhlangana komuntu kufanele afinanswe uhulumeni kanye namuntu kamuva.

q16.text: Amalungelo omhlaba wendabuko kanye wesiko kufanele amukelwe umthetho futhi asindiswe, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba umthetho womuntu.

q17.text: Abasebenzi kufanele abe namalungelo amakhulu okuthuma umuntu kanye nokumemeza, kanye nokunciphisa imikhela yokusebenza.

q18.text: Inkokhelo yesibalo sebasebenzi kufanele iengenezwe kakhulu ukuze kuwe ubuhlu bemsebenzini, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba izikhundla.

q19.text: Ukulobola umuntu kuze kuthathwe umuntu (ukungeneza nokubheka) kungeneza umnotho kanye nenzalo.

q20.text: Amalungelo abasebenzi (isifundo sepaliyente, sekugula, kanye nokuhlangulela) kufanele zengenezwe kanye nokusebenza kulonke umsebenzi.

q21.text: Amaphoyisa kufanele anikeze amandla amakhulu kanye nezimali ukuze anqobe ubuhlu bekuyeketha, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba amandla ohulumeni.

q22.text: Amalungelo okusho isikhundla sakho kanye nokugqajwa kufanele akuphakamisele, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba umuntu.

q23.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele ibe nomthetho ovikela amalungelo omuntu kanye okwazi okulandelela.

q24.text: Imikhosi kanye nokumemeza kufanele zibe nemthetho ovikela, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba imibono.

q25.text: Uhulumeni wekhomanda kufanele ube nomuntu osifundo kanye nokuhlola okulandelela umthetho, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba okukhethwa.

q26.text: Izikhundla zokulandelela umthetho kufanele zisindiswe, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba umuntu omubi.

q27.text: Umuntu omubi kufanele alandelwe ngokusheshisa kanye nokucacisa, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba izinqumo.

q28.text: Amabandla ezepolitiki kufanele abuse ndawonye okuze bacake umuntu, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba amalungu.

q29.text: Uhulumeni kabusha kufanele anqobe umkhandlu okamuva ongenile umthetho, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba autonomy.

q30.text: Abakhokheli bezepolitiki abavula amalungelo noma iNkosi kufanele babe nekhonsekwensi.

q31.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke umthetho womuntu wokukhula kwechibi kanye nokuthi wehlukanise umandla wekhabhoni.

q32.text: Uhulumeni kufanele anikeze amagcina amakhulu ekwakheni amandla ambuthano okuze kuwe umandla wekhabhoni.

q33.text: Umthetho womuntu kufanele ube phezulu kukhona okwakho esiwela umhlaba.

q34.text: Uhulumeni kufanele anikeze amalungelo kubantu be-LGBTQ+ kanye nokuvikela lokho.

q35.text: Uhulumeni kufanele asizele okulingana kwabakosikazi nge-umthetho wepaliyente kanye nokuvikela amalungelo.

q36.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele isizele umnotho wokukhula emasimu enkosi nge-izinqumo zentengelo enkunzi.

q37.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele icele izinqumo zentengelo ezikhululisa intengelo yeizwe.

q38.text: Izinqumo zentengelo kufanele zigxile ekulingeni izinkampani zesintu nge-amagcina kanye nemthetho.

q39.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele ibeke umthetho ovikela ngokuqala abantu basesintu, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba izinye izwe.

q40.text: Uhulumeni kufanele beke umthetho ovikela umuntu owezamazimu ongenile ilanga, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba umsebenzi.

q41.text: Ukudla komuntu kufanele kuzuzwe nge-isikhundla sentengo sokuqala kanye nezinduzi zesintu.

q42.text: IseNingizimu Afrika kufanele ibheke inguquko enkulu yomnotho kanye nomsebenza, hhayi okuncane okuyenye.

q43.text: Ubuhlu be-apartheyidi kufanele bubhekwe ngakumbi (okuncane), hhayi ngokuguqulwa konke isigaba.

q44.text: Amagcina okuthutha kufanele agxile ekwakheni izithuthu zesintu kunokuwela umuntu, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba umuntu.

q45.text: Izindlu ezirhwebo kufanele zigxile ekulingeni izakhi zesintu, hhayi ekhokhisa amagcina ekhompani.

q46.text: Izindawo kufanele zibeke umthetho omuntu wetaxi, okungalangathanisa, kanye ebantwini bahambe ngezinyawo, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba umuntu.

q47.text: Izinqumo zohulumeni kufanele zicele ukuthi abantu abagula bakwazi ukusebenza, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba izikhundla.

q48.text: Uhulumeni kufanele anikeze amagcina amakhulu ekhaya elinenza izingane kanye emasikweni.

q49.text: Izinqumo ze-Employment Equity kanye ne-BEE kufanele zibe izinqumo ezibalulekile, nakubona lokhu kumkhomba izikhundla.

q50.text: Izinqumo zokuqeqeshwa kufanele zinikezelwe kubantu abahlukene okuze basizele umsebenzi.

disclaimer.title: Umchazelo Ombalulekile
disclaimer.educational: I-Elekti iyithuluzi lezifundo, hhayi isikhundlekelo sesisifundo. Amakompani ezepolitiki ayinto ezinengqondo enokunye okugqile okushintsha ngenjwayelo.
disclaimer.alpha: Umsaidhi uyindawo eyukela nokuqaliswa. Izinto zingashintsha, futhi idatha ingagcinwa ngoba siyabuyisela indlela yethu.
disclaimer.research: Siqhaqu kakhulu ukuthi ufunde amahhovela amakompani, ulubale emafowulamabi engaba, kanye nokuthi uqingisise imininingwane wethu ngokwakho. Sebenzisa lezi miphumela njengenqwaba yosifundo-nge-okunye, hhayi njengesinqumo sakho sokugcina.
